issue.message: JCenter Maven repository is no longer receiving updates: newer library versions may be available elsewhere
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.

A newer version of com.google.android.gms:play-services-maps than 17.0.1 is available: 18.0.0
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.3.0 is available: 1.4.0
A newer version of androidx.work:work-runtime than 2.6.0 is available: 2.7.1
A newer version of androidx.fragment:fragment-ktx than 1.3.5 is available: 1.4.0
A newer version of androidx.core:core-ktx than 1.5.0 is available: 1.7.0
A newer version of org.osmdroid:osmdroid-android than 6.1.10 is available: 6.1.11
For locale "el" (Greek) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "lb" (Luxembourgish) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "de" (German) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "pt" (Portuguese) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "fr" (French) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "ru" (Russian) the following quantities should also be defined: `few`, `many`
For locale "es" (Spanish) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "cs" (Czech) the following quantities should also be defined: `few`, `one`
For locale "ca" (Catalan) the following quantities should also be defined: `one`
For locale "pl" (Polish) the following quantities should also be defined: `few`, `many`, `one`

"contactDetailsDistanceUnitKilometres" is not translated in "cs" (Czech), "de" (German), "pt" (Portuguese), "ja" (Japanese), "fr" (French), "pl" (Polish), "ca" (Catalan), "es" (Spanish), "zh" (Chinese)
"contactDetailsDistanceUnitMeters" is not translated in "cs" (Czech), "de" (German), "pt" (Portuguese), "ja" (Japanese), "fr" (French), "pl" (Polish), "ca" (Catalan), "es" (Spanish), "zh" (Chinese)

The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (0, 1), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
As of Android 12, `android:exported` must be set; use `true` to make the activity \ available to other apps, and `false` otherwise.
As of Android 12, `android:exported` must be set; use `true` to make the activity \ available to other apps, and `false` otherwise.
As of Android 12, `android:exported` must be set; use `true` to make the activity \ available to other apps, and `false` otherwise. For launcher activities, this should be set to `true`.
As of Android 12, `android:exported` must be set; use `true` to make the activity \ available to other apps, and `false` otherwise. For launcher activities, this should be set to `true`.
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.

This `AsyncTask` class should be static or leaks might occur (org.owntracks.android.ui.preferences.connection.dialog.ConnectionSecurityViewModel.CopyTask)
This `AsyncTask` class should be static or leaks might occur (org.owntracks.android.ui.preferences.connection.dialog.ConnectionSecurityViewModel.CaCrtCopyTask)
This `AsyncTask` class should be static or leaks might occur (org.owntracks.android.ui.preferences.connection.dialog.ConnectionSecurityViewModel.ClientCrtCopyTask)
Very long vector path (904 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
The resource `R.drawable.cursor_white` appears to be unused
The resource `R.drawable.ic_baseline_battery_unknown_24` appears to be unused
`TextView-1` can overlap `@id/ws` if @string/preferencesWebsocket grows due to localized text expansion
`TextView-1` can overlap `@id/cleanSession` if @string/preferencesCleanSessionEnabled grows due to localized text expansion
`TextView-1` can overlap `@id/tls` if @string/tls grows due to localized text expansion
When you define `paddingStart` you should probably also define `paddingEnd` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingStart` you should probably also define `paddingEnd` for right-to-left symmetry
